pages.text: The $(5)Ender Sigil$() is a master key to the void. It allows the wielder to manipulate the very space between atoms, granting two distinct abilities of the End.
First, by $(6)Right-Clicking$() into the distance, you can $(5)warp across great gaps$() instantly, mimicking the movement of an Enderman without the need for fragile pearls.
Second, by $(6)Sneak-Right-Clicking$(), you can reach through a rift in reality to access your $(d)Ender Chest$() from anywhere in the world. Your treasury is now always within reach.
